extendedInfo.description: WHAT IS 'TOKI CLOCK FREE'?'Toki Clock Free' is a clock app for your Android.  Have your Andriod phone display the time, calendar, and time from cities around the world while it is being charged.*** Differences between this FREE VERSION and the Paid version are:1) Advertisement Banner is displayed at the bottom of the screen.2) Free version supports devices with resolutions greater than 480x854 (Paid version supports resolutions greater than 320x480)==========BEFORE USING:- To avoid going into Sleep mode, when 'Toki Clock Free' is running, the system's auto-lock features is automatically disabled.- Alarm feature works only when 'Toki Clock Free' is running in front.  Alarm will not sound when 'Toki Clock Free' is running in the background.SUPPORTED DEVICES:'Toki Clock Free' supports devices with resolutions greater than 480x854.  Also, devices with square screen are not supported.  The devices I tested this version of 'Toki Clock Free' are as follows:   1) HTC Sensation (540x960)   2) Galaxy S III (720x1280)   3) Nexus One (800x480)   4) Galaxy Nexus (720x1280)   5) Nexus 7 (1200x1920)FEATURES:- Display the world time for up to 5 cities simultaneously.  You can choose from 244 major cities around the world.- Adjusts to daylight saving time (summer time) automatically for all the cities.- Choose from 10 skins.- Display a 1-month or 2-month calendar.  The calendar display can start with Sunday or Monday.- Choose between a 12-hour and 24-hour clock.- Show/hide the seconds display.- Flash or don't flash the time separators.- Dim the backlight.- Option to display the time with big numbers. - Show/hide dot animation.  There are s animations:     1) Car     2) Character up and down- Choose from 3 different formats for the date display.- 8 bit sound alarm!Enjoy!=====RECENT RELEASE HISTORY:August 14, 2013 - v1.2.1- Reviewed code and optimized.- Now the frame rate max is set to 60fps.  This reduces electricity consumption by eliminating unnecessary redraws.August 13, 2013 - v1.2.0- Fixed a crasher bug by adding a null check before drawing.August 13, 2013 - v1.1.9- Fixed a crasher bug upon launch on Nexus 7 (2nd Gen).  Please note that setup icons (such as 'change skin' icon and 'change mode' icon) are now displayed smaller to support various devices.June 28, 2013 - v1.1.8- Month name display for July and August was wrong for some skins (themes.)  Fixed.December 25, 2012 - v1.1.7- When in 24 Hour display mode, 17 hour, 18 hour, and 21 hour were diplayed wrong.  Fixed.December 23, 2012 - v1.1.6- Fixed bug where "Change Mode" icon was being displayed when it wasn't supposed to be.- Fixed unexpected behavior bug when screen was tapped in the large-display mode.December 22, 2012 - v1.1.5- Fixed a bug where alarm time was displayed wrong.December 21, 2012 - v1.1.4- Optimized code to use less memory.- Added 5 new skins (theme colors).December 18, 2012 - v1.1.3- Added high resolution icons.December 16, 2012 - v1.1.2 (1st FREE version release)- Now it supports devices with resolutions between 320x480 and 720x1280.- Added graphics for high resolution devices.- Fixed backlight bug.- Fixed a bug where "Tap" action wasn't being accepted when in landscape mode.- Fixed a bug where alarm sound becomes faster (or slower).- Fixed a bug where 11:00AM is displayed as 11:00PM.- Fixed a bug with separator flashing.- To support devices without [Back] buttons, added [Done] button in alarm settings screen and city selection screen.======================
